Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great in and outdoor seating, sandwiches and soup were really good. Lovely staff.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Don't hesitate to give it a try! whether you want to grab a bite or just have a drink while enjoying the beautiful canals the jordaan has to offer, this is the place to be!  And on another note the waiters are really friendly!

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: The sandwich we ordered was good but nothing special. I liked the old atmosphere of the place but when we were there it took too long for a staff to come take our order and get the bills. Unfortunately we didn‚Äôt feel that welcome here. Probably it‚Äôs a good place for regular customers but not for passers like us.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great staff. The food was really good! I had the Fresh Ravioli and Mint Tea. I sat at a table inside where we could see the canals, although the have outside seats as well. I would return if it wasn't my last day in the city üôÇif I could go back I would try the Vegan Ravioli üòÑ

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great place with very nice food and local atmosphere. Gets the day time sun perfectly too :)

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Classic Dutch brown bar serving snacks, sandwiches, etc. that are better than average. Particularly pretty spot on the canal with a charming view of a footbridge. Nice service, nice terrace.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Fantastic little restaurant by the canal! Festina Lente offers tasty food & friendly service in a picturesque setting! Little gem :D

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Friendly, great place to chill for a few hours. Small selection of older board games which thre family enjoyed!

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Nice coffee place, good soups and light meals

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Super cozy streetcorner food cafe with a couple of outside tables and afternoon sun. Nice coffee and delicious burrata salad

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Easy-going Dutch brown bar, lovely staff, good selection of beers on tap. Good spot outside against the wall catches the afternoon sun. Snack menu available till 22:30. Enjoyed the nachos, they hit the spot!

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great authentic atmosphere, range from afterwork to first date to board game- people, lovely staff and the most important: especially delicious meals. We had appetizers, fish and meat and desserts. All in all a perfect place to spend your precious time.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Extremely rude staff. Don‚Äôt mind arrogant attitude but then at least get the order right.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: It was so warm inside that we had to relocate outside. Outside it was so crowded that there was no space to hang out, except by a table. We were then told by the staff that we couldn't stand there. The interior left much to offer, though ‚Ä¶

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Nice experience they have ice cold craft beers and the people are friendly

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Food was alright. Service during lunch hours pretty slow. The girl working are not aware that lunch breaks are limited. I had the meat balls. They were pretty damn good. The ceviche wasn‚Äôt good but the lentil soup was dope. Sitting outside is definitely a plus

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: I Love Festina Lente. It's Dutch cool. Attracts a cool crowd. Has some great beers and drinks, food is pretty good and the atmosphere is great too. Cool outside bit. Located on a lovely canal in Amsterdams old city. Festina occasionally run ‚Ä¶

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: A local pub, but more like a old fashion pub. Not like the interior but like the atmosphere. People come here to read a newspaper.  Read a book. Have a good discussion. With a pint of local brew beer. Such as IJwit. Limited seats but wonderful place to be on a Sunday afternoon

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: A firm favourite since we moved to Dam, can easily lose an afternoon or evening sat here enjoying the vibe. Since it‚Äôs small you want to get in early though!

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: One of the nicer bars in the area. Especially if you are lucky to get a table outside on a sunny day. Drinks menue is good, staff is always friendly.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Too crowded but cool

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great place if you are a starlet, after going here you will understand what it means to have met Weinstein, in fact you will feel you have just been screwed and didn't do anything to avoiding it. get ready to pay 7 eur for 1 slide of bread. ‚Ä¶

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Good atmosphere and nice food! Nice that the terrace is on a quiet street

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Cozy place to have a bite.  Food was pretty good and staff was friendly.  Their dinner plates are slightly larger than tapas, slightly smaller than an entree.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Nice place, excellent food and a great service. I recommend it

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great little bar overlooking a quiet canal. Service was good. We had the nachos which was really fantastic. A great quiet spot for a drink.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Traditional cafe bar in the Jordaan offering a cosy interior for cold winter months and canal side picnic benches for the long summer nights.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: THE place to play board games while enjoying a good cup of coffee or tea or a beer. If the sun is out, their terrace is brilliant!

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text:
A very cozy and welcoming bar, with a great dinner menu to kick things off!
Board games and large tables make it really great for groups!

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Awesome vibe and a great selection of board games

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: We had soup and beers in this neighborhood bar. Fast service and good quality of the food and drinks, just a bit crowded in there. Good prices!

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Both Bavette and Lamb merguez burger with goat cheese were delicious for a very very reasonable price. Almost too good to be true and maybe it should stay a best kept secret

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great staff, and lovely food

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great spot to grab a drink and food. Outdoor seating spills out onto the bridge and onto the streets, a great way to experience Amsterdam.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Great place, pity it's too small, but it's part of its charm. There are board games, a great offer in beers on draft, and the food is really good.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: Festina is a good cafe with good drinks, coffee's, mint hot drinks & gember hot drinks & then good beers. Also good foods are available!!! Also good music in Festina.

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text:

Name: Festina Lente
Review Text: I love this place, I always pass there when I go for lunch and I see people squeezing on a small bench to catch a bit of sun while having their delicious coffee.

Name: Festina Lente

Name: Festina Lente

Name: Festina Lente
